scripts.develop: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt develop
scripts.release: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt release
scripts.master: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt master
scripts.start: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt develop && start node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json && start node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 && node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server -a localhost -p 8080
scripts.unit: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt develop && start node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json && start node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 && karma start test/unit/karma.conf.js
scripts.e2e: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt develop && start node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json && start node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 && start webdriver-manager start && start node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server -a localhost -p 8080 && protractor test/e2e/protractor-conf.js
scripts.startgulp: npm install && node node_modules/bower/bin/bower install && node node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp build && start node node_modules/apimocker/bin/apimocker.js -c mocks/config.json && start node node_modules/json-server/bin/index.js mocks/animals/animals.json -p 3001 && node node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server ./build -a localhost -p 8080
scripts.heroku: bower install && bower update && grunt develop
